message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your product, but I am looking for a lower price. How about $100?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $100.  Would you consider $115?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I will not be able to accept $115. How about $110?
